runs.comm: length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it past point for a quick couple of runs
comes in from wide of the crease, the batsman gets cramped for room, defends it down the pitch
a loose shot outside off! He does this often, tries to drive it on the up, but the ball zips past the outside edge
takes a step down the pitch but the bowler fires it on his pads.. Rohit misses the flick and gets hit on the pads
length delivery outside off, he comes forward and then opens the face of the bat at the last moment to run it down to third man
good line from Mashrafe! It's on off stump and at good pace, the batsman defends it down the pitch
tossed up from over the wicket, the batsman defends it to square leg
flatter, turns to the pads, the batsman nudges it to backward square leg
lots of air on this one, the batsman comes forward and pushes it easily to long on for a single
that was very close! Dhawan looks to punch it through off, but gets an inside edge past the leg stump.. He has been in trouble against offspinners lately
uses his feet and pushes the ball softly to long on for a single
shorter and quicker, Dhawan was out of the crease early but misses his flick, gets hit over the knee roll
that has disappeared! It's a short delivery that Rohit hammers over deep square leg.. 85 meters, deep into the stands..How does he get that much power behind those!
can be said that this is a bit unnecessary! He looks to ramp a full delivery from outside off, but gets a thick edge towards third man
another inside edge for Dhawan! It misses the leg stump again as Dhawan looks to play on the off
this one zips past the outside edge! Nippy delivery from Al-Amin, it is on short of length and bounces a touch extra to beat the batsman's waft

another inside edge, this time the leg stump lights up! He was looking a little flustered in the middle, so he chooses to dance down the pitch, but only managed to play outside the line. Al-Amin is fired up
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery solidly to cover point
bowls it slow on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the leg side for a quick single
tossed up nicely, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly
another tossed up delivery, but this is slightly outside off. Kohli allows it to turn, then taps it softly past the slip fielder for a couple
this one is too far down the leg side, easy call for the umpire
tossed up from wide of the crease, the batsman goes back and defends
this one was the arm-ball and Kohli - he read the length right, but not the spin.. looks to pull, but doesn't get his timing right
stays back and dabs it to the right of midwicket for an easy single
length delivery on the stumps, Kohli goes back and clips it straight to midwicket
length delivery outside off, no room from the bowler, the batsman can only dab it to the leg side for a quick single
angled delivery on off and middle, Rohit tucks it behind square leg for a single

wow! This is the repeat of the shot Anamul played in the first session! It was full delivery outside off, a half-volley, and Kohli goes down on his knee, gets under it, and smashes it over extra cover for a huge hit
he corrects his length this time, the batsman clips it to deep square leg for a single
the batsman defends it to point, but Al-Amin as overstepped. Tight call that one.. Looked alright to me
he looks to hoick this from outside off but gets a big top edge.. Nasir at midwicket settles under it to pouch it comfortably, but it doesn't count
full and flighted on the leg stump, the batsman  moves his front leg out and drives it to long off
loud appeal for lbw! But this was probably going down the leg side.. Dharmsena shows no interest.. Good delivery that one
he plays an across the line swipe to deep midwicket!
he comes down the pitch and easily whacks it over midwicket for a boundary, never really looks to hit it too hard, just chips it over the infield
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
there is no lack of timing or power in this one! He comes down the pitch and smashes the length delivery past the cover fielder.. He made no attempt to keep that down, but the fielder had no chance
back of length delivery outside off, Virat steers it easily to third man for a single
back of length on the pads, and the crowd has gone silent, since Rohit easily tucks it past the short fine leg fielder for a four.. Poor direction from the bowler
length delivery on off, he dabs it to backward point off the front foot, picks up a single
looks like a front foot defensive push, but that quickly goes to wide long-off and Kohli picks up an easy couple
stays in the crease and whips the length delivery to deep square leg for a single
slightly slower outside off, Rohit stays in the crease and steers it past point for an easy couple
this one stays low and turns in, the batsman looks to punch it to long on but is not in control, ends up pushing it in the air
full and flighted on off, Rohit clips it to deep backward square leg for an easy single
the batsman comes forward and dabs it to the right of midwicket for an easy single
takes a step down and punches the flatter delivery down to long on
flatter and quicker, the batsman goes back and pushes it straight to cover
tossed up, this one turns as well, but easily tucked to deep square leg off the back foot
he comes down the pitch and pushes the back of length delivery calmly down to long on
back of length delivery on off, the batsman steers it to gully to pick up an easy single
comes forward and punches the length delivery straight down the ground for a single

they have dropped it! What was the midwicket fielder doing back there! Gazi runs back towards the deep and completely messes up Anamul's catch! Rohit had looked to launch this out of the ground, but only got the height.. That was an easy catch for Anamul.. They are lucky that they didn't collide.. but that is Gazi's fault..
length delivery, pushed back to the bowler

back of length delivery, again Rohit targets that deep midwicket area with a front-foot pull.. This one is a difficult chance for Anamul as he has to run a long way to his left.. He dives, but doesn't get to it
he comes down the pitch and pushes this softly towards deep midwicket, they call early and manage to complete a tight second

there is no stopping Kohli though! He comes down the pitch, makes the ball a half-volley and whips it over midwicket with ease.. He never looks in any trouble playing these shots.. Lots of wrist in that one
he stays back and clips the flatter delivery to deep midwicket
on the pads again, nudged to square leg for an easy single
flatter and outside off, he is quick to rock back, then punches this firmly past the lone cover fielder.. Runs away to the boundary in quick time
now keeps the strike with a dab to square leg
fuller and outside off, the batsman pushes it with an open face to the gap at cover point
he looks to come down the pitch but gets beaten in the flight, so he checks it and defends towards short third man
misses out on a full toss, he drives it straight to deep cover
pushed through too far down the leg side
lots of flight on this one, Kohli comes down the pitch and drives it along the ground to long off
waits in the crease and dabs it to the vacant midwicket region for a single
this stays low and comes slower off the pitch, but Kohli adjusts his whip to the leg side, hitting it to wide long on
bowls a slower delivery outside off, Kohli comes forward and pushes it down to long on
comes forward and chips the fuller delivery to long on for an easy single
bowls a good offcutter, the batsman dabs it to midwicket and looks for a couple, but Rohit turns the second one down
back of length on the stumps, Rohit whips it behind square on the leg side for a single
takes it from the keeper's gloves! He waits for this short of length delivery, then cuts it late to beat the short third man fielder comfortably
bowls a good slower ball on off, but all the men on the leg side are patrolling the boundary, so the batsmen pick up a single to midwicket
fuller and quicker, the batsman comes forward and punches it to long off
this is full on the leg stump, but Rohit manages to play an inside out chip over the cover fielder! he didn't try to hit that hard, but he picked it from leg stump.. smartly done
he comes forward and defends this down the pitch
this one is chipped over the infield again, but this keeps the fielder at deep cover interested for a bit.. loose shot this one
flatter delivery on the stumps, defended down the pitch
stays on the back foot and punches the flatter delivery to deep midwicket for a single
gets a lot of spin, but this is misdirected, goes well down the leg side
he comes down the pitch, but gets an inside edge to midwicket as he looks for the big shot
flatter and shorter, the batsman pulls it past the short fine leg fielder for a couple.. 100 is up
he comes down the pitch and looks to hit it over the top with the turn, doesn't get hold of it and it drops well short of the deep midwicket fielder
turning down the leg side, the batsman easily flicks it to deep backward square leg for a single
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it down the ground to long on
tossed up and slow outside off, but this turns a mile, easily tucked to short fine leg for a single that brings up Rohit's half-century - his second consecutive fifty
short and wide, he calmly steers it past the point fielder.. Doesn't hit it hard, just shows it the direction and beats the man at third man comfortably
bowls a good yorker outside off, the batsman digs it out to cover for a single
he leans into the fuller delivery to punch this to long off to bring up his half-century
he comes down the pitch, but the bowler delivers a slower one wide outside off, Rohit has to stretch to reach it, he ends up dabbing it to cover
fuller delivery outside off, Kohli punches this easily to long off for a single
he punches the length ball firmly, but hits it straight to extra cover
short and wide, Kohli has already advanced down the crease and he punches it to deep cover to bring up the century of the partnership

he is given it away! A low full toss, Rohit hits it straight to the point fielder. He does this often and goes back disappointed again. Not much expression from the Bangladesh team, they know this has come too late in the day
poor first delivery to the new batsman, this is pushed down the leg side
length delivery on off, Dhoni stays on the back foot and pushes this past the non striker for a single
bowls an offcutter outside off, Kohli dabs it down to third man for a single
back of length on off stump, Dhoni stays back and defends it down the pitch
he stays deep in the crease, punches this back of length delivery to the left of mid-off and calls for a sharp single
he stays back and punches the length delivery straight to cover
prefers to stay deep in the crease, pushes the length ball past the non striker to long on
fuller on the pads, Kohli flicks this easily to deep midwicket
length delivery outside off, Dhoni sheds his approach of pushing for a single, swings his arms at that and whacks it over mid-off for a one-bounce four
comes down the pitch but gets cramped for room as the bowler fires a short of length delivery on his body, he pushes it back down the pitch
slower delivery attempted, but Dhoni reads it well, then flat-bats it over midwicket for a six.. Just clears the rope. He didn't look to hit it hard
he comes down the pitch and slices the full delivery down to third man for a single
fuller and on the stumps, Dhoni jabs it down to long on for a single
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
he takes a step down the crease and pushes the length delivery down to long on
not too much width outside off, but Dhoni is able to chop the short of length delivery to backward point for a single
he takes a step down, but Mashrafe bowls a slow offcutter. Kohli chops it straight to point
full and wide outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover for a single
fuller on off stump, Kohli plays his whippy offdrive to deep cover for a single
that's the end of it! Dhoni picks up a full delivery wide outside off and sends it soaring towards the sight screen
